name: AshenLight
description:
Make your way up to the third level defeating enemies along the way! Dashing gives you invincibility. Time your parry with an enemy attack in order to stun them and make them vulnerable for a short time!

Known Issues:
     You can sometimes still take damage even if you parry an enemy

Keyboard & Mouse:
    attack: left mouse
    heavy attack: shift + left mouse
    block: hold right mouse
    parry: shift + right mouse
    dash: space bar
    go up a level: w in front of a door
    go down a level: s in front of a door

Controller (recommended):
    attack: right bumper
    heavy attack: right trigger
    block: left bumper
    parry: left trigger
    dash: east game pad button (b on xbox)
    go up a level: up on d pad in front of a door
    go down a level: down on d pad in front of a door

Questions:

So we ended up uploading the wrong version last week. So the questions will remain the same but this time will be in the context of how a level might look or feel.

    How does the dash feel, does the player dash too far, how easy does the it make the       gameplay, does the dash give you too many iframes?
    How do the enemies feel? Do you think you could handle 3+ enemies at once?
    What are some other general balancing suggestions you have?

Some planned features:
    incorporating healing for killing enemies,
    clean up sprites/animations
    side areas for upgrades
    final boss
